jsanalyser.analyser

Class Analyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsanalyser.analyser.Analyser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumericAnalyser, RegexAnalyser, StringAnalyser, TokenAnalyser

    public abstract class Analyser
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing an analyser.

    An analyser contains a list of elements matching the analyser's type.

    By default, for the report, an analyser will display, for each element, the number of time the element appears in the code.

    A specificReport hook can be overridden to display more informations regarding each element.

    • Field Detail

      • reportTitle

        protected java.lang.String reportTitle
        The title of the analyser's report

      • elements

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> elements
        The collections of elements of the analyser. Each element is a tuple containing the element itself (in a string) and The number of occurences of the element in the code.

      • getElementOccurences

        protected java.lang.Integer getElementOccurences(java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        key - The element value.
        Returns:
        the number of occurences of a given element. 0 if the element does not exist in the collection.

      • incElementOccurences

        public void incElementOccurences(java.lang.String key)
        Increment the number of occurences of a given element.
        Parameters:
        key - The element value.

      • run

        public void run(boolean verbose)
        Run the analys on the elements collection.

        For each element, it's number of occurences will be displayed and the specificReport(boolean, java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer) method will be called.

        Parameters:
        verbose - A verbose mode, used only if necessary in the specificReport(boolean, java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer) method

      • specificReport

        public void specificReport(boolean verbose,
                  java.lang.String element,
                  java.lang.Integer nbOccurences)
        Method to be overloaded to run a specific report on each element.
